executable.title: ConvertLabelMapValueToChestRegionChestType
executable.description: This simple program takes an unsigned short label \ map value that conforms to the labeling conventions laid out in \ cipConventhions.h and writes to the command line the corresponding chest \ region and chest type.
executable.contributor: Applied Chest Imaging Laboratory, Brigham and Women's hospital
executable.acknowledgements: This work is funded by the National Heart, Lung, And Blood Institute of the National \ Institutes of Health under Award Number R01HL116931. The content is solely the responsibility of the authors \ and does not necessarily represent the official views of the National Institutes of Health.

integer.name: value
integer.description: The unsigned short label map value
